name: Duck 'n' Cover
description:
Inspired by bomb survival levels in Little Big Planet
and roguelike games. As a corpo duck you have to
survive unceasing armageddon in randomly
generated levels. Everything but Steven is destructible.


Xbox Gamepad Controlls

Left Stick - Move
A - Jump, Climb
RB, LB - Dash

Keyboard Controlls

A, D - Move
Space - Jump, Climb
Left, Right Arrow Keys - Dash

How to play?

Collect points, upgrade your statistics, find new permanent
skills and the most important survive. Duck yourself!

Instalation

Just download and extract the game files. After extracting, run .exe file.

Game controller recommended.

Please note that this is not a final build of the game, it's still
in development and you can find some bugs.

Comments and suggestions are welcome!
